docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21. -- The United States delegation to the Pan-American Conference, scheduled to open at Montevideo on Dec. 3, has been tentatively selected, but official announcement will be withheld for several days. Hotel reservations have been...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21. -- The United States delegation to the Pan-American Conference, scheduled to open at Montevideo on Dec. 3, has been tentatively selected, but official announcement will be withheld for several days. Hotel reservations have been made for the delegation at Montevideo and officials here discount published rumors of postponement of the conference.

headline.main: MONTEVIDEO GROUP SELECTED AT CAPITAL; Tentative List for Pan-American Parley Includes Hull, Caffery, Wright and Braden.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 21. -- Well-informed private sources here, in Asuncion, Paraguay, and in Rio de Janeiro insist that President Justo of Argentina and Vargas of Brazil, at their recent meeting in Rio de Janeiro, drew up a new Chaco peace formula and...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 21. -- Well-informed private sources here, in Asuncion, Paraguay, and in Rio de Janeiro insist that President Justo of Argentina and Vargas of Brazil, at their recent meeting in Rio de Janeiro, drew up a new Chaco peace formula and presented it to Bolivia and Paraguay.

headline.main: NEW PEACE EFFORT IN CHACO PROPOSED; Argentina and Brazil Are Said to Seek to Have Us With Them on Arbitral Board. ZONE WOULD BE FIXED Bolivia and Paraguay Would Be Asked to Determine the Area to Be Adjudicated.

docs.snippet: Definite indications that the Recovery Administration has turned to that phase of its program designed to assure fair competition in industry cheered business executives here during the week. Coincident with the formation of a fair trade practice...
docs.lead_paragraph: Definite indications that the Recovery Administration has turned to that phase of its program designed to assure fair competition in industry cheered business executives here during the week. Coincident with the formation of a fair trade practice committee, headed by Lincoln Filene of Boston, it was learned that expert accountants will advise deputy administrators on the various cost provisions included in codes.
docs.abstract: formation of Com welcomed by business men

headline.main: INDUSTRY CHEERED BY TWO NRA STEPS; Fair Practice Croup and Move to Use Cost Accountants Regarded Favorably. LATTER TO CLARIFY CODES Ban on Below-Cost Sales Poses Problems -- Draw Up Complaints on Unfair Trade Methods.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 23 -- Secretary Hull plans to sail from New York on Nov. 4 for the seventh Pan American Conference, scheduled to open in Montevideo on Dec. 3, he announced today. The Secretary of State will go by the Pacific coast of Latin America...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 23 -- Secretary Hull plans to sail from New York on Nov. 4 for the seventh Pan American Conference, scheduled to open in Montevideo on Dec. 3, he announced today. The Secretary of State will go by the Pacific coast of Latin America and will pay visits to government authorities in Peru, Chile and Argentina en route, according to the present plans.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 26. -- The United States accepted today the invitation of the League of Nations to name a representative on the governing board that will deal with German refugees who have fled political persecution in their native country.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 27. -- The entire United States delegation to the Pan American Conference at Montevideo will sail from New York on the steamship American Legion on Nov. 11, Secretary Hull announced today. Mr. Hull has definitely given up his...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 27. -- The entire United States delegation to the Pan American Conference at Montevideo will sail from New York on the steamship American Legion on Nov. 11, Secretary Hull announced today. Mr. Hull has definitely given up his previous intention of leaving a week earlier to hold consultations en route with the governments of Peru, Chile and Argentina.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 27. -- With many delegates to the Seventh Pan-American Conference already en route to Montevideo, the preconference atmosphere daily is becoming more sombre. Fresh outbreaks of political violence were reported today in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 27. -- With many delegates to the Seventh Pan-American Conference already en route to Montevideo, the preconference atmosphere daily is becoming more sombre. Fresh outbreaks of political violence were reported today in the Uruguayan capital.

headline.main: REVOLT IN BRAZIL SEEN AS IMMINENT; Rising in South This Month Against Vargas Predicted -- Uruguay Also Tense. HULL DELAYS DEPARTURE He Will Sail for the Montevideo Conference on Nov. 11 After Seeing Litvinoff.
